text: The result saw [redacted_name], [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] be near invulnerable to attacks or firearms, but they were extremely vulnerable to the cold. Exposure to low temperatures would see the insects that make up the B.O.W freeze causing them to slow down. During this period, the girls would be vulnerable to attack as the insects would be unable to avoid collision. Excessive exposure would lead to permanent freezing and ultimately death.
trans: Le résultat a rendu [redacted_name], [redacted_name] et [redacted_name] presque invulnérables aux attaques ou aux armes à feu, mais elles étaient extrêmement sensibles au froid. Une exposition à de basses températures provoquait le gel des insectes composant l'A.B.O., ce qui les ralentissait. Pendant cette période, les filles devenaient vulnérables aux attaques, car les insectes ne pouvait éviter les collisions. Une exposition excessive entraînait un gel permanent et, ultimement, la mort.
